availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, stonemason. Native of England. Married to Elmina Snowden. Father of Sarah J. Snowden, John Snowden, Rebecca Snowden, Ellen Snowden, Susan Snowden, and William Snowden. Stonemason in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 134-135.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Town of Hawesville, p. 13.
"John Snowden (1825-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial #89301458, accessed April 6, 2017, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89301458.
